ej,blacb001,M,ticht901,Argument over substitutes ej,colbc001,C,ticht901,Argument over substitutes $Padres manager Bud Black ejected by HP umpire Todd Tichenor as they disagreed on subs; Black claimed he indicated 'two hole', which would put new pitcher Bryan Corey batting second and Edgar Gonzalez playing second base, batting ninth; Tichenor said he interpreted Black's motion as 'straight up' meaning that the pitcher would bat ninth; Black continued to argue and was ejected; Scott Hairston moved from center field to play second base; Padres bench coach Craig Colbert took over managing, but continued to argue and was also ejected by Tichenor
